item.title: How can the EU address migrant fatalities in the Mediterranean?
item.description:
The recent tragedies in the Mediterranean Sea have added to the already significant number of migrant deaths. EU officials are responding to this urgent issue, and this is what their response should include. First, a large-scale search and rescue operation is needed. The EU’s ‘Triton’ operation, which replaced the Italian ‘Mare Nostrum,’ is insufficient for saving lives. It was incorrectly assumed that ending ‘Mare Nostrum’ would deter migrants and reduce deaths...
